1.brief: properly, to eye or (generally) to heed, i.e. pay attention; by implication, to respond; by extension to begin to speak; specifically to sing, shout, testify, announce
a Shuchite or descendant of Shuach

2.brief: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
where?; hence, whither?, when?; also hither and thither
to put (used in a great variety of applications, literal, figurative, inferentially, and elliptically)
a word; collectively, a discourse; figuratively, a topic
to separate mentally (or distinguish), i.e.(generally) understand
properly, the hind part; generally used as an adverb or conjunction, after (in various senses)
perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue

3.brief: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute
properly, a dumb beast; especially any large quadruped or animal (often collective)
to be impure in a religious sense
an eye (literally or figuratively); by analogy, a fountain (as the eye of the landscape)

4.brief: to pluck off or pull to pieces; causatively to supply with food (as in morsels)
properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire
properly, heed, i.e. purpose; used only adverbially, on account of (as a motive or an aim), teleologically, in order that
to loosen, i.e. relinquish, permit, etc.
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
to remove (intransitive or transitive) figuratively, to grow old; specifically, to transcribe
properly, a cliff (or sharp rock, as compressed); generally, a rock or boulder; figuratively, a refuge; also an edge (as precipitous)
properly, a standing, i.e. a spot; but used widely of a locality (general or specific); also (figuratively) of a condition (of body or mind)

5.brief: properly, assemblage; used only adverbially also, even, yea, though; often repeated as correl. both...and
illumination or (concrete) luminary (in every sense, including lightning, happiness, etc.)
morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
to be extinguished; figuratively, to expire or be dried up
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles

6.brief: illumination or (concrete) luminary (in every sense, including lightning, happiness, etc.)
to be dark (as withholding light); transitively, to darken
a tent (as clearly conspicuous from a distance)
a lamp (i.e. the burner) or light (literally or figuratively)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
to be extinguished; figuratively, to expire or be dried up

7.brief: to press (intransitive), i.e. be narrow; figuratively, be in distress
to throw out, down or away (literally or figuratively)
advice; by implication, plan; also prudence

8.brief: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
to send away, for, or out (in a great variety of applications)
a foot (as used in walking); by implication, a step; by euphemistically the pudenda
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a net-work, i.e. (in hunting) a snare, (in architecture) a ballustrade; also a reticulated ornament to apillar
to walk (in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively)

9.brief: to seize (often with the accessory idea of holding in possession)
a heel (as protuberant); hence, a track; figuratively, the rear (of an army)
a (metallic) sheet (as pounded thin); also a spring net (as spread out like a lamina)
to fasten upon; hence, to seize, be strong (figuratively, courageous, causatively strengthen, cure, help, repair, fortify), obstinate; to bind, restrain, conquer
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

10.brief: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)

a rope (as twisted), especially a measuring line; by implication, a district or inheritance (as measured); or a noose (as of cords); figuratively, a company (as if tied together); also a throe (especially of parturition); also ruin
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

11.brief: (as noun) a circle, neighbour, or environs; but chiefly (as adverb, with or without preposition) around
to dash in pieces, literally or figuratively (especially to disperse)
a foot (as used in walking); by implication, a step; by euphemistically the pudenda

12.brief: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)

properly, to be erect (i.e. stand perpendicular); hence (causatively) to set up, in a great variety of applications, whether literal (establish, fix, prepare, apply), or figurative (appoint, render sure, proper or prosperous)

a rib (as curved), literally (of the body) or figuratively (of a door, i.e. leaf); hence, a side, literally (of a person) or figuratively (of an object or the sky, i.e. quarter); architecturally, a (especially floor or ceiling) timber or plank (single or collective, i.e. a flooring)

13.brief: properly, separation; by implication, a part of the body, branch of atree, bar forcarrying; figuratively, chief of a city; especially (with prepositional prefix) as an adverb, apart, only, besides
skin (as naked); by implication, hide, leather
properly, separation; by implication, a part of the body, branch of atree, bar forcarrying; figuratively, chief of a city; especially (with prepositional prefix) as an adverb, apart, only, besides
death (natural or violent); concretely, the dead, their place or state (hades); figuratively, pestilence, ruin

14.brief: a tent (as clearly conspicuous from a distance)
properly, a refuge, i.e. (objective) security, or (subjective) assurance
to pace, i.e. step regularly; (upward) to mount; (along) to march; (down and causatively) to hurl

15.brief: to reside or permanently stay (literally or figuratively)
a tent (as clearly conspicuous from a distance)
properly, failure, i.e. nothing or destruction; usually (with preposition) without, not yet, because not, as long as, etc.
to toss about; by implication, to diffuse, winnow
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
(adjectively) at home; hence (by implication of satisfaction) lovely; also (noun) a home, of God (temple), men (residence), flocks (pasture), or wild animals (den)
properly, cypress-resin; by analogy, sulphur (as equally inflammable)

16.brief: the bottom (as depressed); only adverbially, below (often with prepositional prefix underneath), in lieu of, etc.
to be ashamed, confused or disappointed; also (as failing) to dry up (as water) or wither (as herbage)
properly, the upper part, used only adverbially with prefix upward, above, overhead, from the top, etc.
severed, i.e. harvest (as reaped), the crop, the time, the reaper, or figuratively; also a limb (of a tree, or simply foliage)

17.brief: a memento, abstractly recollection (rarely if ever); by implication, commemoration
properly, to wander away, i.e. lose oneself; by implication to perish (causative, destroy)
properly, a part of; hence (prepositionally), from or out of in many senses
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
an appellation, as amark or memorial of individuality; by implication honor, authority, character
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
properly, separate by awall, i.e. outside, outdoors

18.brief: illumination or (concrete) luminary (in every sense, including lightning, happiness, etc.)
near, with or among; often in general, to
the dark; hence (literally) darkness; figuratively, misery, destruction, death, ignorance, sorrow, wickedness
the earth (as moist and therefore inhabited); by extension, the globe; by implication, its inhabitants; specifically, a particular land, as Babylonia, Palestine
properly, to wave to and fro (rarely to flap up and down); figuratively, to rove, flee, or (causatively) to drive away

19.brief: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock
a non-entity; generally used as a negative particle
a temporary abode; by extension, a permanent residence

20.brief: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
to stun (or intransitively, grow numb), i.e. devastate or (figuratively) stupefy (both usually in a passive sense)
hinder; generally, late or last; specifically (as facing the east) western
to seize (often with the accessory idea of holding in possession)

21.brief: a particle of affirmation, surely; hence (by limitation) only
a residence (including a shepherd's hut, the lair of animals, figuratively, the grave; also the Temple); specifically, the Tabernacle (properly, its wooden walls)
the masculine demonstrative pronoun, this or that
properly, a standing, i.e. a spot; but used widely of a locality (general or specific); also (figuratively) of a condition (of body or mind)
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles

to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
